action.program_description: Email client displaying a new email.
action.mouse_action: The mouse cursor is hovering over the email body.
action.general_scene_description: The screenshot shows an email client with a new email open. The email is from Fujitsu regarding rescheduling a meeting. The user is requesting to reschedule the meeting for an hour later. The original meeting time was 2024-11-17 at a specific time, which is partially visible in the screenshot.
